name: Mini Pound Cakes
description: Deliciously soft and buttery mini pound cakes — perfect for tea time or gifting, baked fresh with love.

name: Classic Cupcakes
description: Fluffy vanilla cupcakes topped with smooth buttercream frosting. A timeless treat for every sweet tooth.

name: Assorted Macarons
description: Colorful, delicate macarons with crisp shells and creamy fillings — a French classic in every bite.

name: Celebration Cake
description: A beautifully decorated layered cake, perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or any special occasion.

name: Fresh Pastries
description: A delightful selection of crisp, flaky pastries — perfect for breakfast or a light dessert.

name: Glazed Donuts
description: Soft, airy donuts coated in a smooth vanilla glaze — a sweet classic everyone loves.
